#summary FlexXB architecture
#labels Phase-Implementation,Phase-Design

= Annotations =

=== XmlClass ===
 Syntax: {{{[XmlClass(name="MyClass", prefix="my", uri="http://www.your.site.com/schema/")]}}}
=== XmlAttribute ===
 Syntax:{{{[XmlAttribute(alias="attribute", ignoreOn="serialize|deserialize")]}}}
=== XmlElement ===
 Syntax:{{{[XmlElement(alias="element", getFromCache="true|false", ignoreOn="serialize|deserialize", serializePartialElement="true|false")]}}}
=== XmlArray ===
 Syntax:{{{[XmlArray(alias="element", getFromCache="true|false", type="my.full.type" ignoreOn="serialize|deserialize", serializePartialElement="true|false")]}}}
